title: Out now: our “ESG Quarterly” newsletter
body: We created ESG Quarterly as a way to regularly inform our stakeholders about our bank’s sustainability efforts. The newsletter will provide concise information on what we have achieved and which topics our focus is on – now and in the near future. That’s why we’re calling the main feature “What’s on our mind”. The “Meet our experts” section is where we introduce our sustainability ambassadors – the people in our bank who play a key role in driving our sustainability agenda forward. For the current issue we spoke to Chris Jaques, our Head of Group Enterprise Risk Management. He explains how the importance of climate risk has changed in the past ten years and what major challenges for everyone dealing with climate risk are.
